snippet.title: Beyond the Legend: Mysteries of Olympus Gameplay | HD 720p
snippet.description:
★ Beyond the Legend: Mysteries of Olympus
★ Free Download: http://www.bigfishgames.com/games/14065/beyond-the-legend-mysteries-of-olympus/?channel=affiliates&identifier=af5dc3355635
● Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/user/TheCasualGames

Travel to ancient Greece to relive a beautiful tale of romance in this exciting Hidden Object Adventure. Theron, a modest hunter deeply in love with the goddess Artemis, has to overcome all obstacles standing in their way to happiness.

Get on a journey with Theron across the worlds of mighty gods to finally reach Mount Olympus and to prove that he deserves to be with the goddess. Explore gorgeous locations and watch as this amazing and breathtaking story unfolds!

Features:
► Famous characters from ancient Greece
► Additional mini-games
► 300 objects to find including 35 special items
► 30 addictive hidden object scenes for hours of fun


► Social Networks:
● My Google Plus: https://plus.google.com/u/0/+Wholovegames/
● Who Love Games? Everyone! on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RedFrogGames
● Follow me on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/redfroggames
